s.text: He wanted a sound bite--something pithy to take out of context.
But most visionaries are smart and honorable people who are sincerely interested in the future.
But most visionaries are smart and honorable people who are sincerely interested in the future.
A technological visionary must tell people what they want to hear, because your company's stock won't rise if you spout an unpopular vision to analysts.
A technological visionary must tell people what they want to hear, because your company's stock won't rise if you spout an unpopular vision to analysts.
A technological visionary must tell people what they want to hear, because your company's stock won't rise if you spout an unpopular vision to analysts.
A technological visionary must tell people what they want to hear, because your company's stock won't rise if you spout an unpopular vision to analysts.
We as a society have to learn more about the technology that is shaping our lives, and become more comfortable with it.
Predictions must involve either acquiring or losing love, wealth, or life itself--ideally a combination of all three.
